title: Gift an icon?
body: I want to gift an icon to a friend but i don't see how, other than gifting him RP for it.

replies.body:
Gifting Icons has been disabled during Worlds due to a technical error. We made a post about it on Riot Support [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-)

Let me know if you have any other questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XWOWUseR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-27T23:41:36.682+0000)
>
> Gifting Icons has been disabled during Worlds due to a technical error. We made a post about it on Riot Support [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-)
> 
> Let me know if you have any other questions.

Yes. Please. Can you take 250 RP from me and give an icon to one of my friends, please? That person cannot get an icon and I want to give him a C9 icon, because we're C9 Fans and I don't want the joy of using that inside game animation be take from us. :( Please.

Unfortunately, that's something we cannot do. =/

Another option to ensure your friend gets the C9 icon and the emote to spam during games is to gift your friend RP so they can buy the icon themself. We have a guide on how to do this [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any other concerns.
If that would be an option for me, then I would do that, but I didn't do it for a certain amount of reasons. I cannot do that :(
